greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of A218784. Lengths of runs in A213728 and A213729.
comment: These numbers tell how many times the infinite trunk of beanstalk (A179016) branches into the same direction, before changing the direction.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8650
xref: A218546 gives the positions of records. Cf. also A218547. Also the first differences of A218544, i.e. a(n) = A218544(n+1)-A218544(n).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 02 2012
